notes.text:
This update for gnuplot fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-25559: Fixed double free when executing print_set_output() (bsc#1176689).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: gnuplot 5.5 is affected by double free when executing print_set_output. This may result in context-dependent arbitrary code execution.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
